todoist.api¶

class todoist.api.TodoistAPI(token='', api_endpoint='https://api.todoist.com', session=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Implements the API that makes it possible to interact with a Todoist user account and its data.

classmethod deserialize(data)[source]¶
serialize()[source]¶
get_api_url()[source]¶
generate_uuid()[source]¶

Generates a uuid.

sync(commands=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Sends to the server the changes that were made locally, and also fetches the latest updated data from the server.

commit()[source]¶

Commits all requests that are queued. Note that, without calling this method none of the changes that are made to the objects are actually synchronized to the server, unless one of the aforementioned Sync API calls are called directly.

login(email, password)[source]¶

Logins user, and returns the response received by the server.

login_with_google(email, oauth2_token, **kwargs)[source]¶

Logins user with Google account, and returns the response received by the server.

register(email, full_name, password, **kwargs)[source]¶

Registers a new user.

delete_user(current_password, **kwargs)[source]¶

Deletes an existing user.

upload_file(filename, **kwargs)[source]¶

Uploads a file.

query(queries, **kwargs)[source]¶

Performs date queries and other searches, and returns the results.

get_redirect_link(**kwargs)[source]¶

Returns the absolute URL to redirect or to open in a browser.

get_productivity_stats()[source]¶

Returns the user’s recent productivity stats.

update_notification_setting(notification_type, service, dont_notify)[source]¶

Updates the user’s notification settings.

get_all_completed_items(**kwargs)[source]¶

Returns all user’s completed items.

get_completed_items(project_id, **kwargs)[source]¶

Returns a project’s completed items.

get_uploads(**kwargs)[source]¶

Returns all user’s uploads.

kwargs:
limit: (int, optional) number of results (1-50) last_id: (int, optional) return results with id<last_id
delete_upload(file_url)[source]¶

Delete upload.

param file_url: (str) uploaded file URL

add_item(content, **kwargs)[source]¶

Adds a new task.

share_project(project_id, email, message='', **kwargs)[source]¶

Appends a request to the queue, to share a project with a user.

delete_collaborator(project_id, email)[source]¶

Appends a request to the queue, to delete a collaborator from a shared project.

take_ownership(project_id)[source]¶

Appends a request to the queue, take ownership of a shared project.

get_project(project_id)[source]¶

Gets an existing project.

get_item(item_id)[source]¶

Gets an existing item.

get_label(label_id)[source]¶

Gets an existing label.

get_note(note_id)[source]¶

Gets an existing note.

get_filter(filter_id)[source]¶

Gets an existing filter.

get_reminder(reminder_id)[source]¶
